other-functions: Sparse Linear System Solvers, Batched Functionality
current-use-case: CFD, Finite Volume, Electrostatics, Power Grid Problems, ...
library-description: Ginkgo is a high-performance numerical linear algebra library for many-core systems, with a focus on solution of sparse linear systems. It is implemented using modern C++ (you will need an at least C++17 compliant compiler to build it), with GPU kernels implemented for NVIDIA, AMD and Intel GPUs.
